name: P.S.I. (Gameboy)
description:
A local TV editor has been found murdered.  The key piece of evidence to solve the entire case is somewhere in his apartment. It's up to you to explore the apartment through revolutionary first-person 3D graphics, running on real Gameboy hardware. Explore the apartment, find evidence, and solve the case in P.S.I.

COLLECT key evidence in your inventory to unravel a conspiracyEXPLORE a detailed 3-D environment and take note of every detail

(Made in 72 hours for the 4th Ben Bonk Game Jam)

CONTROLS:

Up - Up Arrow / W 

Down - Down Arrow / S 

Left - Left Arrow / A 

Right - Right Arrow / D 

A - Alt / Z / J 

B - Ctrl / K / X 

Start - Enter

(Playable in browser or as a ROM file on Gameboy, Gameboy Color, Gameboy Advance, and Analogue Pocket)
